title: Team-Based Learning (TBL) Workshop for Evidence-Based Decision Making

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Learner Role: Pre-service/In-service Teachers, Domain Expertise: Advanced, Subject/Job Field: Mathematics, Assessment Method: Formative Assessment-Centered, Technology Environment: Bring Your Own Device (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can apply evidence-based decision-making steps to select optimal nursing interventions in real clinical scenarios.
Learners can critically analyze decision-making rationales and propose improvements through peer feedback during TBL (Team-Based Learning) team activities.
Learners can utilize digital tools (BYOD) to visually represent evidence-based literature searches and data analysis results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
